entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kindersley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -25.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kindersley Airport 12:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -25.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -28.3°C
Wind: SE 37 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 16.
